pageContext.claim: “Watched low rated @Morning_Joe for first time in long time. FAKE NEWS. He called me to stop a National Enquirer article. I said no! Bad show”
pageContext.analysis: Joe Scarborough and Mika Brzezinski dispute this account. They {wrote in an op-ed in The Washington Post}: "This year, top White House staff members warned that the National Enquirer was planning to publish a negative article about us unless we begged the president to have the story spiked. We ignored their desperate pleas."
